backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing user profiles, app data storage, access control, and domain types for dates, payments, events, and travel entries.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script converting old userProfiles map into new userAppData format with timestamps and versioning.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata file listing feature implementations, linked files, components, and test IDs for development tracking.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication, profile setup, and rendering the ledger page within theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header bar with branding, sync status, and user menu including logout that clears caches and local storage.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication guard rendering a login screen until the user is authenticated via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty-state UI component showing an icon or illustration, text, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users for their name and saving their profile with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableS: Wrapper adding horizontal scroll support to tables using ScrollArea and ScrollBar UI components.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusIndica: Displays sync status with icons and optional last-sync timestamp, switching visuals based on syncing, synced, or failed states.
frontend/src/features/ledger/BackupResto: Provides UI to export ledger data to a backup file and restore from uploaded backups with confirmation flows and merge handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CarExpenses: Allows adding car expenses by category, computes totals for a date range, and displays a form in a dialog.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CashPayment: Dialog form for recording a traveller's cash payment with amount, date, and optional note input validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ClearDataPa: Password‑protected panel offering multiple destructive data‑clear actions with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DailyPartic: Renders a grid to mark AM/PM trips per traveller, manage weekend inclusion, and save draft participation data.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: Simple popover-based picker for adjusting start and end dates of the ledger’s active date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCarEx: Confirmation dialog for deleting a car expense and triggering a toast notification.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCashP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a cash payment with a success toast.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCarExpe: Dialog for editing car expense details with validation and update callbacks.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCashPay: Dialog for editing a traveller’s cash payment, validating amount and saving updates.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExpenseHist: Wrapper dialog that opens a large view of car expense history.
Displays and filters car expenses by date, category, and search, with edit and delete actions.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Button that opens the export report dialog.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportRepor: Dialog for exporting ledger data with format options, filters, and traveller selection.
Main ledger page composing tabs, dialogs, and state syncing with unsaved-change handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: Context provider exposing ledger state, actions, and persistence helpers from useLedgerLocalState.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OtherPendin: Dialog form for adding a pending amount to a traveller with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallSumm: Computes and displays income, expenses, and monthly profit/loss summary for the selected date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentHist: Dialog wrapper showing the payment history view via a trigger button.
Displays filtered, sortable cash payment history with edit and delete controls.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Input control for viewing and updating the per‑trip rate with validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Computes per‑traveller trip counts, charges, payments, and balances for a date range and renders a summary UI.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: Manages adding, renaming, and deleting travellers, blocking deletion if balance is not zero and rendering a list UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppDataSync.ts: Handles periodic sync between local ledger state and remote backend, merging changes and saving with conflict checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading and managing identities via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: Maintains local ledger state with persistence in localStorage and utilities for modifying travellers, trips, payments, and settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React‑query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes plus base styling for body, borders, and tables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/backupRestore.ts: Handles exporting, importing, validating, and merging backup JSON files for the ledger state.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Provides helpers to list days in a range and format dates for keys or display.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Generates CSV-based Excel exports for daily trip grids and traveller summaries.
frontend/src/utils/exportReport.ts: Creates filtered CSV reports including daily grids, summaries, payments, and expenses.
frontend/src/utils/ledgerBalances.ts: Computes a traveller’s balance based on trips, payments, and pending amounts within a date range.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Formats and parses INR currency values.
frontend/src/utils/tripCalculations.ts: Calculates total and monthly income from trip data considering weekend inclusion rules.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the hash.
frontend/src/utils/weekendInclusion.ts: Helpers to detect weekend days and determine if a date is included or editable based on Saturday/Sunday flags.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, custom colors, typography, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing sync-focused app behavior, existing features, and pending feature requests.
